reviewText: I bought it because I am Welsh and belong to a Welsh Club here in Florida.  I presented the film last Tuesday and from the applause after the end of the film I would say that the film is at the top of the list.  It was nice to know how long Wales has been a country and also how proud I am of being Welsh.  I have quite a few DVD's on Wales but this one deserves five stars.
A historical narrative of Wales. The dvd is in good shape and I would recommend this program to friends and family.
